body:
Comment 19: 
Wow, I looked at jz4...'s strace2.txt, and there's nothing really slow there.  The whole
system is just taking forever (0.1+ seconds) to do even the simplest system calls.  I'd
run uptime, top, look for runaway programs, and if not, wonder about VirtualBox.  Maybe
the large (but empty, not paged in) memory mappings that Go uses are causing problems.
_Labels changed: added **expertneeded**._ _Status changed to **HelpWanted**._
